author: Parex Network
title: Raccoonswap
shortDescription: Raccoonswap allows users anywhere in the world to trade PRX without...
description: Raccoonswap allows users anywhere in the world to trade PRX without an intermediary. Raccoonswap is the largest decentralized exchange (or DEX) operating on the Parex blockchain.

author: Parex Network
title: RaccoonInfo
shortDescription: A Raccoonswap info dashboard dApp that provides real-time analytics on liquidity pools...
description: A Raccoonswap info dashboard dApp that provides real-time analytics on liquidity pools, token prices, trading volume, and other key metrics. Users can track market trends and monitor their favorite tokens effortlessly.

author: Parex Network
title: Swap dApp
shortDescription: Seamlessly swap PRX <-> SPRX with ease. This decentralized application (DApp) ensures secure...
description: Seamlessly swap PRX <-> SPRX with ease. This decentralized application (DApp) ensures secure, efficient, and instant conversions, allowing users to wrap and unwrap SPRX tokens for enhanced interoperability within the ecosystem.

author: Parex Network
title: Bridge dApp
shortDescription: Effortlessly transfer PEP20 tokens to BEP20 and vice versa...
description: Effortlessly transfer PEP20 tokens to BEP20 and vice versa. This bridge DApp enables secure and seamless cross-chain transfers, ensuring fast and reliable interoperability between networks.
